title: CLM Business Systems Analyst, Analytics
summary: We are seeking an experienced Systems Analyst with over 5 years of hands on experience with Contracts Lifecycle Management (CLM) tools. The ideal candidate will have experience developing and automating operational, analytical, and audit reports in the Sales Contracts space, along with expertise in system integration design, workflow, and clause/template builds. Candidate must have working proficiency leveraging AI/ML technologies to drive process improvements and implement advanced analytics. If you have a passion for excellence and a drive to deliver exceptional results, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
description: Develop and manage operational, analytical, and audit reports to support contract operations and SOX controls. Manage contracts data quality, governance, and act as a data steward. Design and integrate with upstream/downstream systems, configure contract workflows. Conduct requirements analysis, design, build, testing, end-user training, and system rollouts leveraging schedule/project management skills. Maintain a strong focus on customer delight and effectively manage multiple changing priorities. Collaborate with and project manage multi-functional group projects. Develop Stored Procedures/Views/Triggers etc within databases like MS SQL Server, Snowflake. Use reporting tools such as Tableau and Business Objects to develop reporting solutions. Leverage AI/ML concepts for continuous improvements in contracting flows, reporting and analytics.
preferred_qualifications: Strong analytical, problem-solving and project management skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities. Ability to self manage and work in a collaborative and fast-paced environment
